QuestData.Title: We Have Company
QuestData.Description: Outsider, I've spotted Iron Horde soldiers nearby.$b$bIt is bold, even for them, to venture into such deadly territory.$b$bIf you do not deal with their presence, they will surely be a threat to your camp.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the Iron Horde camp in Sulfur Basin.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, friend. I am in your debt.$b$bThis arrogant Iron Horde has made a dangerous enemy today.
